articles.title: Amy Grant leaves hospital, postpones shows following bicycle accident - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: Grant postponed several shows, while her husband, Vince Gill, canceled a few of his own.
articles.content:
Amy Grant is recovering from a bicycle accident. (Photo: Derek White/Getty Images)
Two days after being hospitalized following a bike accident, "Baby Baby" singer Amy Grant, 61, has been discharged … [+2003 chars]
